skins.name: Yinlin
skins.description: An outfit Yinlin commissioned her favorite qipao shop to make. Flamboyant, extravagant... Adjectives that aren't normally used on secret agents describe the real Yinlin behind her many masks.

tags.name: Electro DMG Amplification
tags.description: Provides Electro DMG Amplification for a specific Resonator in the team

tags.name: Resonance Liberation DMG Amplification
tags.description: Provides Resonance Liberation DMG Amplification for a specific Resonator in the team

85.name: Morality's Crossroads
85.description: Resonance Skill <color=Highlight>Magnetic Roar</color> and <color=Highlight>Lightning Execution</color> deal {0} more DMG.

86.name: Ensnarled by Rapport
86.description: Resonance Skill <color=Highlight>Electromagnetic Blast</color> recovers an additional {1} <te href=850030>Judgement Point(s)</te> and {2} Resonance Energy on hit.

87.name: Unyielding Verdict
87.description: Forte Circuit <color=Highlight>Judgment Strike</color>'s DMG multiplier is increased by 55%.

88.name: Steadfast Conviction
88.description: When Forte Circuit <color=Highlight>Judgment Strike</color> hits a target, the ATK of all team members is increased by {0} for {1}s.

89.name: Resounding Will
89.description: Resonance Liberation <color=Highlight>Thundering Wrath</color> deals {0} extra DMG to targets with Forte Circuit's <color=Highlight>Sinner's Mark</color> or <color=Highlight>Punishment Mark</color>.

90.name: Pursuit of Justice
90.description: In the first 30s after casting Resonance Liberation <color=Highlight>Thundering Wrath</color>, when Yinlin's <color=Highlight>Basic Attack</color> hits a target, <color=Highlight>Furious Thunder</color> will be triggered, dealing <color=Thunder>Electro DMG</color> equal to 419.59% of Yinlin's ATK. Every <color=Highlight>Basic Attack</color> hit can trigger <color=Highlight>Furious Thunder</color> 1 time, up to 4 times. This is considered Resonance Skill DMG.

params.name: Zapstring's Dance
params.description:
<size=40><color=Title>Basic Attack</color></size>
Yinlin controls the puppet "Zapstring" to perform up to 4 attacks, dealing <color=Thunder>Electro DMG</color>.
<size=10> </size>
<size=40><color=Title>Heavy Attack</color></size>
Yinlin consumes STA to control "Zapstring", dealing <color=Thunder>Electro DMG</color>.
<size=10> </size>
<size=40><color=Title>Mid-air Attack</color></size>
Yinlin consumes STA to control "Zapstring" to perform a Mid-air Plunging Attack, dealing <color=Thunder>Electro DMG</color>.
<size=10> </size>
<size=40><color=Title>Dodge Counter</color></size>
Use <color=Highlight>Basic Attack</color> after a successful <color=Highlight>Dodge</color> to attack the target, dealing <color=Thunder>Electro DMG</color>.

params.name: Magnetic Roar
params.description:
<size=40><color=Title>Magnetic Roar</color></size>
The puppet "Zapstring" deals <color=Thunder>Electro DMG</color> to the target, and puts Yinlin in Resonance Skill <color=Highlight>Execution Mode</color>.
<size=10> </size>
<size=40><color=Title>Execution Mode</color></size>
<color=Highlight>Basic Attack</color> and <color=Highlight>Dodge Counter</color> will trigger 1 <color=Highlight>Electromagnetic Blast</color> when hitting a target.
Each stage of <color=Highlight>Basic Attack</color> or <color=Highlight>Dodge Counter</color> can only trigger 1 <color=Highlight>Electromagnetic Blast</color>, up to 4 times.
<size=10> </size>
<size=40><color=Title>Electromagnetic Blast</color></size>
Attack all targets marked with Forte Circuit <color=Highlight><te href=850029>Sinner's Mark</te></color>, dealing <color=Thunder>Electro DMG</color>.
<size=10> </size>
<size=40><color=Title>Lightning Execution</color></size>
Use Resonance Skill after casting Resonance Skill <color=Highlight>Magnetic Roar</color> to cast <color=Highlight>Lightning Execution</color> to attack the target, dealing <color=Thunder>Electro DMG</color>.
If Resonance Skill <color=Highlight>Lightning Execution</color> is not activated in a while or this Character is switched, this Skill will be put on Cooldown.

params.name: Thundering Wrath
params.description: Command "Zapstring" to call for thunder to fall upon a large range, dealing <color=Thunder>Electro DMG</color>.

params.name: Pain Immersion
params.description: After using Resonance Skill <color=Highlight>Magnetic Roar</color>, Yinlin's Crit. Rate is increased by {0} for {1}s.

params.name: Deadly Focus
params.description: The damage of Resonance Skill <color=Highlight>Lightning Execution</color> is increased by {0} when hitting targets marked with <color=Highlight><te href=850029>Sinner's Mark</te></color>, and Yinlin's ATK is increased by {1} for {2}s when this is triggered.

params.name: Raging Storm
params.description: Command puppet "Zapstring" to attack, dealing <color=Thunder>Electro DMG</color> in a large range.

params.name: Chameleon Cipher
params.description:
<size=40><color=Title>Chameleon Cipher</color></size>
When Yinlin's Judgment Points are full, her <color=Highlight>Heavy Attack</color> is replaced with <color=Highlight>Chameleon Cipher</color>, which consumes all Judgment Points to attack the target, dealing <color=Thunder>Electro DMG</color>. When it hits a target marked with <color=Highlight>Sinner's Mark</color>, the <color=Highlight>Sinner's Mark</color> is replaced with <color=Highlight>Punishment Mark</color>, lasting for {0}s. <color=Highlight>Chameleon Cipher</color> deals Heavy Attack DMG.
<size=10> </size>
<size=40><color=Title>Sinner's Mark</color></size>
Basic Attack <color=Highlight>Zapstring's Dance</color>, Resonance Liberation <color=Highlight>Thundering Wrath</color>, and Intro Skill <color=Highlight>Roaring Storm</color> apply <color=Highlight>Sinner's Mark</color> to the target on hit.
<color=Highlight>Sinner's Mark</color> is removed when Yinlin is switched out.
<size=10> </size>
<size=40><color=Title>Punishment Mark</color></size>
When a target marked with <color=Highlight>Punishment Mark</color> takes damage, <color=Highlight>Judgement Strike</color> will fall, triggering Coordinated Attacks to all targets marked with <color=Highlight>Punishment Mark</color>, dealing <color=Thunder>Electro DMG</color>. This can be triggered up to 1 time per second. <color=Highlight>Judgement Strike</color> deals Resonance Skill DMG.
<size=10> </size>
<size=40><color=Title>Judgment Points</color></size>
Yinlin can hold up to {1} Judgement Points. Yinlin gains Judgement Points through the following ways:
Upon casting Intro Skill <color=Highlight>Raging Storm</color>
When Basic Attack <color=Highlight>Zapstring's Dance</color> hits a target
Upon casting Resonance Skill <color=Highlight>Magnetic Roar</color>;
When Resonance Skill <color=Highlight>Electromagnetic Blast</color> hits a target;
Upon casting Resonance Skill <color=Highlight>Lightning Execution</color>.

params.name: Strategist
params.description: The incoming Resonator has their Electro DMG Amplified by {0} and Resonance Liberation DMG Amplified by {1} for {2}s or until they are switched out.

params.name: Tune Break: Rectifier
params.description: When the target's <color=Highlight>Off-Tune Level</color> is full, the Resonator may cast <color=Highlight><te href=100001>Tune Break</te></color> on the target.
